testsuite.system-out: Given the character https://rickandmortyapi.com # RickAndMortyStepDefinition.theCharacter(String) When the user wants to get the status of the character with /api/character/76 # RickAndMortyStepDefinition.theUserWantsToGetTheStatusOfTheCharacterWith(String) Then the user should see that he is Dead # RickAndMortyStepDefinition.theUserShouldSeeThatHeIsStatus(String) Given the character https://rickandmortyapi.com # RickAndMortyStepDefinition.theCharacter(String) When the user wants to get the statusCode of the character with /api/character/120 # RickAndMortyStepDefinition.theUserWantsToGetTheStatusCodeOfTheCharacterWith(String) Then the user should see that her statusCode is 200 # RickAndMortyStepDefinition.theUserShouldSeeThatHerStatusCode(int) Given the character https://rickandmortyapi.com # RickAndMortyStepDefinition.theCharacter(String) When the user wants to get the statusCode of the character with /api/character/672 # RickAndMortyStepDefinition.theUserWantsToGetTheStatusCodeOfTheCharacterWith(String) Then the user should see that her statusCode is 404 # RickAndMortyStepDefinition.theUserShouldSeeThatHerStatusCode(int) Given the character https://rickandmortyapi.com # RickAndMortyStepDefinition.theCharacter(String) When the user wants to get the statusCode of the character with /api/character/120 # RickAndMortyStepDefinition.theUserWantsToGetTheStatusCodeOfTheCharacterWith(String) Then the user should see that the statusCode is different to 404 # RickAndMortyStepDefinition.theUserShouldSeeThatTheStatusCodeIsDifferentTo(int)
